input.sentences: excited to see nin for the first time .
i like that i can see them on the big screen if someone tall gets in front of me .
hey finished off the night with head like a hole . wow best live show i have ever scene .
output.sentences: I was so excited to go to the NIN concert this time.
My friends and I got pretty good seats.
There was a tall screen up front that showed close ups of the band members.Wow!
The best part was when they sang my favorite song, "Hurt".
Wow! The end of the show was the best scene of the night!
